snippet.title: Baby Blues Nightmares - Chapter 1 Official Announce Trailer (Toddler Horror Game 2024)
snippet.description:
DOWNLOAD IT NOW ON STEAM ►► https://store.steampowered.com/app/2836820/Baby_Blues_Nightmares__Toddler_Horror_Game

DOWNLOAD IT NOW ON ITCH.IO ►► https://steelkrill.itch.io/baby-blues-nightmares-chapter-1

Join Our DISCORD ►► https://discord.com/invite/d8WUuuRCJK

Please like, comment and subscribe if you like it.Baby Blues Nightmare is a survival horror stealth game where you play as a toddler and have to do what it takes in order to survive your horror-ish nightmares of what's real and not. Fix, maintain and customize your Tricycle to roam around your little world with. Run, hide and survive but remember; try not to cry when you are scared.. or the monsters will hear you and get you.

WISHLIST IT ON STEAM ►https://store.steampowered.com/app/2836820/Baby_Blues_Nightmares__Toddler_Horror_GameGAME 

Press Kit ► https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1VQTT2cM-Wu9qFtN7UzXuwZTP3ALsAazQ?usp=sharing

IndieDB ► https://www.indiedb.com/games/baby-blues-nightmares-toddler-horror-game

Website ► https://steelkrill.com

Twitter ► https://twitter.com/steelkrill

TikTok ► https://TikTok.com/@SteelkrillStudio

Instagram ► https://instagram.com/Steelkrill
